description: Amendment to closing time, variable pricing and (on-site) service delivery
full_summary:
# 5P467-220222 Shuttle Services
## Request for Proposals

### Notice Details
* Reference Number: WS3831954627
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: WS3831954627
* Publication Date: 2023-01-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-24, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: 2023-02-22

### Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-04-20
* This contract includes two additional one-year option periods.

### Procurement Details
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Solicitation Agency: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Nancy Baessler
	+ Email: `nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`
	+ Agency: PSPC
* Bid Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15194951?extsite=MTUxOTQ5NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Services Description
Parks Canada requires a fee-for-service daily shuttle service for the following locations:
* Upper Lake Louise
* Moraine Lake

Service dates:
* Upper Lake Louise: May 19 to October 9, 2023
* Moraine Lake: June 1 to October 9, 2023

### Evaluation Criteria
* Proposal will be evaluated on a combined technical merit and price.

### Applicable Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Region of Opportunity
The contract is limited to the Province of Alberta.
